bramses/chatgpt-md

Integrates ChatGPT and local LLMs into Obsidian

Related repos

  • MCP server for interacting with Obsidian notes through the local REST API
  • GUI for interacting with local LLMs
  • Server for LLMs to send, edit, delete, and search Telegram messages, manage chats, handle media, and more via MCP
  • Neovim plugin for writing and navigating Obsidian vaults
  • self-hosted chat UI for local LLMs like Alpaca
  • Resources for running LLMs on local hardware
  • AI assistant for Obsidian notes with chat, summaries, and smart linking
  • Chat interface for local LLMs with persistent memory
  • Chatbot that integrates with various LLMs and chat platforms
  • Uses LLMs to generate llms.txt files
